statements: UPDATE TVShowSchedule SET show_title='Game of Thrones', air_time='20:00:00', air_date='2022-10-15' WHERE show_id=1;
UPDATE TVShowSchedule SET air_time='21:30:00', show_title='Breaking Bad', air_date='2022-11-01' WHERE show_id=2;
UPDATE TVShowSchedule SET air_time = '20:00:00', air_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE TVShowSchedule SET air_date = '2022-12-24', air_time = '19:30:00' WHERE show_id = 2;
UPDATE Shows SET channel = 'TBS', air_time = '19:00:00' WHERE show_name = 'Big Bang Theory';
UPDATE Episodes SET season = 2, air_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE show_id = 3 AND episode_number = 10;
UPDATE Shows SET genre = 'Drama', channel = 'HBO', air_day = 'Monday' WHERE show_name = 'Game of Thrones';
UPDATE Episodes SET season = 5, episode_number = 10, air_date = '2023-05-20' WHERE episode_name = 'Series Finale';
UPDATE TV_Shows SET show_name = 'New Show Name', air_date = '2022-12-31', air_time = '20:00:00' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE Cast_Members SET role = 'Lead Actor' WHERE cast_id = 2;

UPDATE Cast_Members SET role = 'Lead Actor' WHERE show_id = 101 AND cast_name = 'John Doe';

UPDATE Channel SET channel_number = 5, channel_name = 'HBO' WHERE channel_id = 1;

UPDATE genres SET genre_name = 'Drama' WHERE genre_id = 5;
UPDATE tv_shows SET show_name = 'Updated Show Name', air_time = '20:00:00', air_day = 'Friday' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE channels SET channel_name = 'Updated Channel Name', channel_number = 100 WHERE channel_id = 2;
